builderConditions.HCRA_DESCRIPTION:
You have not fulfilled the requirements under the Builder Education Program, which was one of the conditions placed on your registration in the previous year. You must provide proof of registration within the next THIRTY (30) days for each of the courses listed below:

1) Business Planning and Management
2) Financial Planning and Management
3) Project Management and Supervision
4) Legal Issues in Housing
5) Construction Technology
6) Customer Service / Tarion Requirements

Once you have provided proof of registration within 30 days, you are required to show proof of successful completion of these courses within the next SIX (6) months. The core competencies must be held by the Registrant (if a sole proprietor or partnership) or by the Directors or Officers (DO) of the Registrant  and can be held by one DO or by a team approach with DOs each demonstrating one or more competencies. You are not allowed to start construction for any additional homes until the core competencies are completed. Failure to provide proof of successful completion within the next SIX (6) months may result in the Registrar increasing security requirements, reducing enrolment limits and/or issuing a Notice of Proposal to revoke your registration.
